title: RADS Error WHAT DO I DO???????????????
body:
Could not connect to HTTP server. Please check that your Internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access. 

WHAT DO I DO I CANT PLAY

replies.body: The error you're receiving may be a bit misleading, as the issue might actually be caused by a security setting issue and not your connection.  Something might preventing your game from loading, so recommend going through the steps found in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help.  Let me know if you have any questions!
